text: Llantrisant Fawr is a community in Monmouthshire, Wales Villages within the community include Llantrisant, Monmouthshire and Llanllowell. The population in the 2011 census was 475. https://www.nomisweb.co.uk/reports/localarea?compare=W04000795 ==References== ==External Links== Category:Communities in Monmouthshire
title: Llantrisant Fawr
